See the * License for the specific language governing rights and limitations * under the License. * The Original Code is Openbravo ERP. * The Initial Developer of the Original Code is Openbravo SL * All portions are Copyright (C) 2001-2006 Openbravo SL * All Rights Reserved. * Contributor(s): ______________________________________. ************************************************************************/ v_varchar2 VARCHAR2(32767) ; TYPE RECORD IS REF CURSOR; cur_columns RECORD; BEGIN FOR cur_columns IN (SELECT DATA_DEFAULT FROM DBA_TAB_COLUMNS WHERE OWNER=p_owner AND TABLE_NAME=p_tableName AND COLUMN_NAME=p_columnName ) LOOP v_varchar2:=cur_columns.DATA_DEFAULT; v_varchar2:=TRIM(SUBSTR(v_varchar2, 1, 2000)); EXIT; END LOOP; RETURN(v_varchar2) ; END DBA_COLUMN_DEFAULT
